name: Slam to Win
description:
Are you ready to tap your way to glory? In Slam to Win, you're thrust into a retro-styled world, with one goal - putting the ball in the basket.

Collect stars to customize your arena and ball. Slam away in a multitude of fun, neon environments.

Can you top your friends on the leaderboard? Can you set the highest score? Can you Slam to Win?

Install now to find out!
